references: 1. Blonk et al. 2008 Milieueffecten van Nederlandse consumptie van eiwitrijke producten. Blonk Milieu Advies in opdracht van VROM -> page 26, table 3.4
calculation-process-documentation: LCA of CO2e from production till retail including packaging, but excluding space occupation of paper and cardboard, transportation thus still included.
name: Seitan
